1. Show that if $X = (X_1, X_2)$ is a random vector, then $\mathbb{E}\left[aX_1 + bX_2 + c\right] = a\mathbb{E}X_1 + b\mathbb{E}X_2 + c$. Establish the result in both the discrete and continuous cases.
